titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain entries of digital processing units.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 4/29/1988--Introduced. Provides that certain digital processing units for automated data processing machines that are imported into the United States after January 16, 1986, and before January 1, 1988, and are unliquidated as of December 31, 1987, shall be liquidated as duty free upon proper request filed with the appropriate customs officer.
